kpi_info.title: Inter VLR hs GSM attempt
kpi_info.use: GSM location update attempts between VLRs, performed by home subscribers (both those coming from another PLMN and the ones inside the network changing the VLR). New home subscribers (just purchased SIM) are updated in this field. This field is also updated if there is no location information in the SIM. In the ATTEMPT field both the normal and telemetric subscribers are counted.
